column4: Just out of curiosity, what do people think "download accelerators" do?
Agreed, but why do people think they do something?

The only situation in which I can think it would work would be if you have a server that has a per-connection limit but supports resuming file downloads and multiple connections. Then you could open n connections, each getting 1/n of the file.
that's basically it - some of them also mess about with networks settings
